mapper.sql: id, number, model, battery, onff, onff_time, location,location_freq, status, remark, creator_id,create_time, updator_id, update_time,company_id
mapper.select:
select
from lm_device where true
and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and number like concat(concat('%',#{number}),'%')
order by id desc
mapper.insert:
insert into lm_device
id,
number,
model,
battery,
onff,
onff_time,
location,
location_freq,
status,
remark,
creator_id,
create_time,
updator_id,
update_time,
company_id
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{battery,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{onff,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{onffTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},

#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update lm_device
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
battery = #{battery,jdbcType=INTEGER},
onff = #{onff,jdbcType=INTEGER},
onff_time = #{onffTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_freq = #{locationFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updator_id = #{updatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where true
and id= #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
